bug.author: treo
bug.summary: Workspace Setting on Computational Graph not working
bug.description: Using the 0.8.1-SNAPSHOT, when building a computational graph, it is possible to put .workspaceMode before and after .graphBuilder(). Only if it is set before it, the setting will actually stick. I expect it to work in both positions.

comments.comment: No longer possible to set workspace mode after graphBuilder(); works as expected when set before.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
